name: Moondance Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Florals..Scent Type: Warm Florals..Key Notes: Velvet Rose, Magnolia, Sandalwood..Fragrance Description: This richly warm-floral fragrance exudes elegance with an edge, like a night filled with sophistication and an air of mystery. It opens with masses of velvet rose centifolia coupled with pink rhubarb. Earthy oakmoss and dreamy sandalwood extend the overflowing bouquet all night long...About the Bottle: An oversized bow, perfectly imperfect. The LoveShackFancy perfume bottle references founder Rebecca Hessel Cohens lifelong love of ribbons with a sculptural bow top that appears tied and tightened by hand. The ivory and pink Ribbon Rosa Flora print is a signature design chosen from over 2,000 in the LoveShackFancy print and lace library to decorate the bottle itself, a softly curved antique-inspired vessel carved with scalloping on top and a ring of rope on the bottom. Once finished, its spray top is removable so the bottle can be upcycled as a bud vase...About the Fragrance: A heart thats as big as it is wild. Last to leave the dance floor. Moondance is an indulgent velvet rose with ethereal and dreamy sandalwood, and whispers of magnolia. Forever fancy with a joie de vivre that makes every moment unforgettable. Created with love and a lively, romantic spirit by perfumer Frank Voelkl....CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water (Aqua/Eau), Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Tetrahydroxypropyl Ethylenediamine, Citric Acid, Citral, Citronellol, Coumarin, Eugenol, Farnesol, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-The spirit of LoveShackFancy is apparent upon firstu2014and second and thirdu2014whiff..-Apply on pulse points to wrists, neck, and behind the ears..-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin..-This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I work with perfumes and have smelt many different scents. I received a holiday tester perfume set for Christmas and had the option to get my favorite full size perfume out of that pack for free. Moondance by Loveshackfancy happened to be in that pack. It was my first time smelling it and I IMMEDIATELY fell in love. It is by far my favorite perfume!!! I am so happy I got the chance to smell thisu2026 New signature scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Notes describe this as a u201cwarm floralu201d. I disagree; my nose gets a very fresh and fizzy floral. Its a nice scent. Very pleasant. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: u201ctravel sprayu201d not good for travel

reviews.review_text: smell is a nice warm floral (vs a bright floral like marc jacobs daisy) but it doesnt last long. i thought this was an eau de toilette.  one gripe i have about this is the loose cap. it comes off very easily and ive found it open in my bag several times. my bag has worn moondance more than i have.   horrible packaging for a travel spray. i considered decanting it into something with sturdier packaging but i shouldnt have to do that. this whole ordeal is just so stupid and annoying, when i think about it, i can only laugh.  im petty enough to never buy anything from loveshackfancy again because of this. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Love Shack Fancy Moon Dance Perfume is an alluring and unique fragrance that envelops you in a warm and floral embrace. This scent is like a dance under the moonlight, where the floral notes mingle with the warmth of the night, creating a captivating and mysterious aura.  The warmth of Moon Dance is immediately noticeable, with rich and sensual undertones that make it ideal for cooler seasons or evening wear. The floral elements in this fragrance add a touch of elegance and femininity, creating a beautifully balanced and sophisticated scent profile.  One of the standout features of Moon Dance is its ability to evoke a sense of nostalgia and romanticism. It feels like a journey back in time, to a place where evenings were filled with charm and intrigue. The longevity of this perfume is excellent, ensuring that its captivating scent lasts for hours without fading.  The bottle design reflects the enchanting and vintage-inspired aesthetic that Love Shack Fancy is known for, making it a lovely addition to your fragrance collection or a thoughtful gift for someone special.  In summary, Love Shack Fancy's Moon Dance Perfume is a warm floral-scented masterpiece that captures the essence of romantic evenings and nostalgia. Its depth, longevity, and overall allure make it a must-have for anyone seeking a fragrance that exudes warmth, mystery, and timeless beauty.
